Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_team.EntityMovement
      • edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_team.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Entity, java.io.Serializable

    public class Player
extends EntityMovement
    This class represents the player. It is what the user will control when playing the game.
    See Also:
